title: Flags of Our Fathers 2006 DVDR R4 NTSC
description:
On the front line of war, there is no time for fear. For 70,000 marines who fought amid bombings and the Japanese gunfire, the bloody battle for Iwo Jima was more than the turning point for the Allies of World War II; It was also the moment that defined their lives. In this epic, which The New York Times calls an overwhelming spectacle, Clint Eastwood (actor and Oscar-winning director) scours the only and most of all the emotional truth of warfare: soldiers may fight for their country, but they die for his friends. Awarded by critics as a film incredible power and provocative a fantastic achievement (Peter Travers, Rolling Stone), Flags of Our Fathers (nominated for an Oscar for Best Sound Editing and Best Sound Mixing) is a powerful story of heroism and bravery deserves to be shared and remembered.
